EmailTemplate.name: 19/03/2013 - Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This is a gentle reminder that the lunch menu for Term 3 is due this Wednesday, 20th March 2013.
Please follow the below link for the menu:
Foundation Lunch Menu Term 3 ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QCf/CfSZmvSbmw92FIkVAh7vVMbsArwzLorXwwYa4o.PEMw= )
We highly appreciate if you could email them to Azizan at azizan.sallehhuddin@britishschool.edy.my or hand them in at the school reception so that we can make the necessary arrangements before start of Term 3.
Thank you for your support and cooperation
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
